titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3933) to amend and extend the authorization for the National Historical Publications and Records Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-539.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/29/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3933 (National Historical Publications and Records Commission).
